name: Royale Age: Battle of Kings
description:
Royale Age is the first ever attempt to combine Battle Royale and Auto Chess into a new refreshing game that highlights your skill and strategy thinking.

BUILD YOUR ARMY


Select from the variety of units that are available and build a personalized army in your style!

COMPETE WITH OTHER KINGS


Prove your worth as the best King by competing in the ranked ladder and win several prizes!

LEVEL UP YOUR KINGDOM


Enrich your people once again and show them you were not poor all along!

UNCOVER HIDDEN CHALLENGES


Find all the secret achievements and earn lots of prizes!
